body_html:
So this PR will not be merged until 1.3 is released?

I'm fine with it per se, but would it be possible for you guys to let us know when will be the merge window cutdown in the future releases?

It would be great for us (and all other contributors) to make better planning ahead, instead of struggling for missed deadlines.

body:
So this PR will not be merged until 1.3 is released? 

I'm fine with it per se, but would it be possible for you guys to let us know when will be the merge window cutdown in the future releases? 

It would be great for us (and all other contributors) to make better planning ahead, instead of struggling for missed deadlines.
